gurmukhi: ੴ> ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ||
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realised through the grace of the divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ੧ ਵਸਤੂ ਨਿਰਦੇਸ਼ ਮੰਗਲਾਚਰਣ
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realised through the grace of the divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪਨੜੈ ਹਥਿ ਅਾਰਸੀ ਅਾਪੇ ਹੀ ਦੇਖੈ
transliteration: Aapanarhai Hadi Aarasee Aapay Hee Daykhai.
translation: The mirror (in the form of world) is in the hand (of the Lord) and man sees of himself in it.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਦੇਖਿ ਦਿਖਾੲਿਦਾ ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨਿ ਭੇਖੈ
transliteration: Aapay Daykhi Dikhaaidaa Chhia Darasani Bhaykhai.
translation: God visualises and makes men see the guises and  philosophies of six Schools (in this mirror).

gurmukhi: ਜੇਹਾ ਮੂੰਹ ਕਰਿ ਭਾਲਿਦਾ ਤੇਵੇਹੈ ਲੇਖੈ
transliteration: Jayhaa Moohu Kari Bhaalidaa Tayvayhai Laykhai.
translation: Man is reflected (in the mirror) in exactly the same way as is his propensity.

gurmukhi: ਹਸਦੇ ਹਸਦਾ ਦੇਖੀਅੈ ਸੋ ਰੂਪ ਸਰੇਖੈ
transliteration: Hasaday Hasadaa Daykheeai So Roop Saraykhai.
translation: The laughing person finds a  laughing form in it.

gurmukhi: ਰੋਦੇ ਦਿਸੈ ਰੋਵਦਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਨਿਮਖ ਨਿਮੇਖੈ
transliteration: Rodai Disai Rovadaa Hoay Nimakh Nimaykhai.
translation: Whereas the wailing person finds himself (as well as everybody) there in the weeping posture. Same is the case of a clever person.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਸਤਿਸੰਗਿ ਵਿਸੇਖੈ ||੧||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Satisangi Visaykhai ?1?
translation: The Lord Himself is prevading this world-mirror but He is specifically preceivable in and through the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੨ ਵਾਹਿਗੁਰੂ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ
translation: Example of an instrumentalist

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਜੰਤ੍ਰੀ ਹਥਿ ਜੰਤ੍ਰ ਲੈ ਸਭਿ ਰਾਗ ਵਜਾੲੇ
transliteration: Jiu Jantree Hadi Jantr Lai Sabhi Raag Vajaaay.
translation: The Lord resembles to an instrumentalist who holding the instrument in his hand plays all the different measures on it.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਸੁਣਿ ਸੁਣਿ ਮਗਨੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਾਪੇ ਗੁਣ ਗਾੲੇ
transliteration: Aapay Souni Souni Maganu Hoi Aapay Goun Gaaay.
translation: Listening to the tunes played he remain immersed in them and eulogises the Supreme.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵਲੀਣੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਾਪਿ ਰੀਝਿ ਰੀਝਾੲੇ
transliteration: Sabadi Surati Liv Leenu Hoi Aapi Reejhi Reejhaaay.
translation: Merging his consciousness in the Word he becomes elated and makes others also delighted.

gurmukhi: ਕਥਤਾ ਬਕਤਾ ਅਾਪਿ ਹੈ ਸੁਰਤਾ ਲਿਵ ਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Kadataa Bakataa Aapi Hai Surataa Liv Laaay.
translation: Lord is the speaker as well as the listener immersed in super consciousness.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਸਰਬੰਗਿ ਸਮਾੲੇ
transliteration: Aapay Hee Visamaadu Hoi Sarabangi Samaaay.
translation: Himself all bliss He premeates one and all.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਤੀਅਾੲੇ ||੨||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Pateeaaay ?2?
translation: This mystery that the Lord is omnipresent, is only understood by a gurmukh, the Guru oriented one.

gurmukhi: ੩ ਅਾਪੇ ਰਸੀਅਾ ਅਾਪ ਰਸ
translation: Himself the enjoyer as well as the joy

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਭੁਖਾ ਹੋੲਿਕੈ ਅਾਪਿ ਜਾੲਿ ਰਸੋੲੀ
transliteration: Aapay Bhoukhaa Hoi Kai Aapi Jaai Rasoee.
translation: He (the Lord) Himself posing to be hungry goes into the kitchen and cooks the food kneading in it all sorts of delights.

gurmukhi: ਭੋਜਨ ਅਾਪਿ ਬਣਾੲਿਦਾ ਰਸ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਸ ਗੋੲੀ
transliteration: Bhojanu Aapi Banaaidaa Ras Vichi Ras Goee.
translation: Himself eating and getting  satiated He showers praises on the dainty dishes.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਖਾੲਿ ਸਲਾਹਿਕੈ ਹੋੲਿ ਤ੍ਰਿਪਤਿ ਸਮੋੲੀ
transliteration: Aapay Khaai Salaahi Kai Hoi Tripati Samoee.
translation: He Himself is the delight as well as the delighted.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਰਸੀਅਾ ਅਾਪਿ ਰਸ ਰਸੁ ਰਸਨਾ ਭੋੲੀ
transliteration: Aapay Raseeaa Aapi Rasu Rasu Rasanaa Bhoee.
translation: He is the juice as well as the tongue which relishes its taste.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਤਾ ਭੁਗਤਾ ਅਾਪਿ ਹੈ ਸਰਬੰਗ ਸਮੋੲੀ
transliteration: Daataa Bhougataa Aapi Hai Sarabangu Samoee.
translation: He permeating through all, Himself is the giver as well as receiver.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖੁ ਹੋੲੀ ||੩||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Soukhu Hoee ?3?
translation: Knowing the fact that He permeates among all, the Gurmukh feels immense pleasure.

gurmukhi: ੪ ੳੁਹੋ ਹੀ
translation: Himself the enjoyer as well as the joy

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਪਲੰਘੁ ਵਿਛਾੲਿਕੈ ਅਾਪਿ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸੳੁਂਦਾ
transliteration: Aapay Palaghu Vichhaai Kai Aapi Andari Saoundaa.
translation: He Himself spreads the bedstead and Himself reclines on it.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਹਣੇ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜਾੲਿ ਕੈ ਦੇਸੰਤਰ ਭੳੁਂਦਾ
transliteration: Suhanay Andari Jaai Kai Daysantari Bhaoundaa.
translation: Entering into the dreams He wanders through far off regions.

gurmukhi: ਰੰਕੁ ਰਾੳੁ ਰਾੳੁ ਰੰਕੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਦੁਖ ਸੁਖ ਵਿਚਿ ਪੳੁਂਦਾ
transliteration: Ranku Raau Raau Ranku Hoi Doukh Soukh Vichi Paoundaa.
translation: Making the poor a king and the king a poor person He puts them in pain and pleasure.

gurmukhi: ਤਤਾ ਸੀਅਰਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਜਲੁ ਅਾਵਟਣੁ ਖੳੁਂਦਾ
transliteration: Tataa Seearaa Hoi Jalu Aavatanu Khaoundaa.
translation: In the form of water He Himself gets hot and cold.

gurmukhi: ਹਰਖ ਸੋਗ ਵਿਚਿ ਧਾਵਦਾ ਚਾਵਾੲੇ ਚੳੁਂਦਾ
transliteration: Harakh Sog Vichi Dhaanvadaa Chaavaaay Chaoundaa.
translation: Amidst sorrows and delights He moves around and responds to the call when called.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖੁ ਰੳੁਂਦਾ ||੪||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Soukhu Raoundaa ?4?
translation: The gurmukh, realising  His nature of premeating through all, attains happiness.

gurmukhi: ੫ ਸਭ ਵਿਚ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਨਿਰਲੇਪ ਹੈ
translation: Deserving distinctions

gurmukhi: ਸਮਸਰਿ ਵਰਸੈ ਸ੍ਵਾਂਤ ਬੂੰਦ ਜਿੳੁ ਸਭਨੀ ਥਾੲੀ
transliteration: Samasari Varasai Saant Boond Jiu Sabhanee Daaee.
translation: As the drops of rain in the svati nakstr (fifteenth star formation among the) twenty seven star formations known in india) fall equally at all places,

gurmukhi: ਜਲ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜਲੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਧਰਤੀ ਬਹੁ ਭਾੲੀ
transliteration: Jal Andari Jalu Hoi Milai Dharatee Bahu Bhaaee.
translation: And falling into water they merge in water and on earth they become earth;

gurmukhi: ਕਿਰਖ ਬਿਰਖ ਰਸ ਕਸ ਘਣੇ ਫਲੁ ਫੁਲੁ ਸੁਹਾੲੀ
transliteration: Kirakh Birakh Ras Kas Ghanay Phalu Phulu Suhaaee.
translation: At places it transforms into plants and vegetation, sweet and bitter; at some places they are well adorned with myriad flowers and fruits.

gurmukhi: ਕੇਲੇ ਵਿਚਿ ਕਪੂਰੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਸੀਤਲੁ ਸੁਖਦਾੲੀ
transliteration: Kaylay Vichi Kapooru Hoi Seetalu Soukhudaaee.
translation: Falling on the banana leaves they transform into cooling camphor.

gurmukhi: ਮੋਤੀ ਹੋਵੈ ਸਿਪ ਮੁਹਿ ਬਹੁ ਮੋਲ ਮੁਲਾੲੀ
transliteration: Motee Hovai Sip Muhi Bahu Mol Mulaaee.
translation: The same when they fall into a sea-shell become pearls.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਸੀਅਰ ਦੇ ਮੁਹਿ ਕਾਲਕੂਟ ਚਿਤਵੈ ਬੁਰਿਅਾੲੀ
transliteration: Biseear Day Muhi Kaalakoot Chitavay Buriaaee.
translation: Gone into the mouth of a snake they turn into deadly poison and always think evil.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਸਤਿਸੰਗਿ ਸੁਭਾੲੀ ||੫||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Satisangi Soubhaaee ?5?
translation: The Lord prevades all places and sits in state in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੬ ਸੰਗਤ ਦਾ ਅਸਰ-ਨਾਨੱਤ੍ਵ
translation: Effect of the company  -

gurmukhi: ਸੋੲੀ ਤਾਂਬਾ ਰੰਗ ਸੰਗਿ ਜਿੳੁ ਕੈਹਾ ਹੋੲੀ
transliteration: Soee Taanbaa Rang Sangi Jiu Kaihaan Hoee.
translation: Mixing with tin, the copper transforms into bronze.

gurmukhi: ਸੋੲੀ ਤਾਂਬਾ ਜਿਸਤ ਮਿਲਿ ਪਿਤਲ ਅਵਲੋੲੀ
transliteration: Soee Taanbaa Jisat Mili Pital Avaloee.
translation: The same copper mixed with zinc appears in the form of brass.

gurmukhi: ਸੋੲੀ ਸੀਸੇ ਸੰਗਤੀ ਭੰਗਾਰ ਭਲੋੲੀ
transliteration: Soee Seesay Sangatee Bhangaar Bhuloee.
translation: Copper mixed with lead changes pewter, a brittle metal called bharath in the Punjab.

gurmukhi: ਤਾਂਬਾ ਪਾਰਸਿ ਪਰਸਿਅਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਕੰਚਨ ਸੋੲੀ
transliteration: Taanbaa Paarasi Parasiaa Hoi Kanchan Soee.
translation: With the touch of the philosopher’s stone, the same copper becomes gold.

gurmukhi: ਸੋੲੀ ਤਾਂਬਾ ਭਸਮ ਹੋੲਿ ਅੳੁਖਧ ਕਰਿ ਭੋੲੀ
transliteration: Soee Taanbaa Bhasam Hoi Aoukhadh Kari Bhoee.
translation: When transformed into ashes copper becomes a medicine.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਣ ਗੋੲੀ ||੬||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Sangati Goun Goee ?6?
translation: Likewise, though the Lord is omnipresent, yet the effects of the company of man are different over men. Knowing this much, the Lord is eulogised in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੭ ਜਲ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Example of water

gurmukhi: ਪਾਣੀ ਕਾਲੇ ਰੰਗ ਵਿਚ ਜਿੳੁ ਕਾਲਾ ਦਿਸੈ
transliteration: Paanee Kaalay Rangi Vichi Jiu Kaalaa Disai.
translation: As water mixed with black dye looks black

gurmukhi: ਰਤਾ ਰਤੇ ਰੰਗ ਵਿਚਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਮੇਲਿ ਸਲਿਸੈ
transliteration: Rataa Ratay Rangi Vichi Mili Mayli Salisai.
translation: And mixed with red water becomes red;

gurmukhi: ਪੀਲੈ ਪੀਲਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਹਿਤੁ ਜੇਹੀ ਵਿਸੈ
transliteration: Peelai Peelaa Hoi Milai Hitu Jayhee Visai.
translation: It turns out to be yellow adding yellow dye;

gurmukhi: ਸਾਵਾ ਸਾਵੇ ਰੰਗ ਮਿਲਿ ਸਭਿ ਰੰਗ ਸਰਿਸੈ
transliteration: Saavaa Saavay Rangi Mili Sabhi Rang Sarisai.
translation: And with the green becomes pleasure-giving green.

gurmukhi: ਤਤਾ ਠੰਢਾ ਹੋੲਿਕੈ ਹਿਤ ਜਿਸੈ ਤਿਸੈ
transliteration: Tataa Tdaddhaa Hoi Kai Hit Jisai Tisai.
translation: According to the seasons it becomes hot or cold.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਜਿਸੈ ||੭||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Soukhu Jisai ?7?
translation: Likewise, the Lord God operates to the needs(of creatures). The Guru-oriented (gurmukh) who is full of joy understands this mystery.

gurmukhi: ੮ ਹੋਰ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Other examples

gurmukhi: ਦੀਵਾ ਬਲੈ ਬੈਸੰਤਰਹੁ ਚਾਨਣ ਅਾਨ੍ਹੇਰੇ
transliteration: Deevaa Balai Baisantarahu Chaananu Anhayray.
translation: Fire lits the lamp and light scatters in the darkness.

gurmukhi: ਦੀਪਕ ਵਿਚਹੁਂ ਮਸੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਕੰਮ ਅਾੲਿ ਲਿਖੇਰੇ
transliteration: Deepak Vichahoun Masu Hoi Kanm Aai Likhayray.
translation: The ink obtained from the lamp is used by the writer.

gurmukhi: ਕਜਲੁ ਹੋਵੈ ਕਾਮਣੀ ਸੰਗਿ ਭਲੇ ਭਲੇਰੇ
transliteration: Kajalu Hovai Kaamanee Sangi Bhalay Bhalayray.
translation: From that lamp women get collyrium.

gurmukhi: ਮਸਵਾਣੀ ਹਰਿ ਜਸੁ ਲਿਖੈ ਦਫਤਰ ਅਗਲੇਰੇ
transliteration: Masavaanee Hari Jasu Likhai Dadhatar Agalayray.
translation: With the same ink are written eulogies of the Lord and the clerk writes accounts in his office.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਰਖੋਂ ਬਿਰਖ ੳੁਪਾੲਿਂਦਾ ਫਲ ਫੁਲ ਘਨੇਰੇ ||
transliteration: Birakhon Birakh Oupaainda Phal Phul Ghanayray?
translation: Therefore by living in the company of good persons one engages himself in good deeds.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਚੳੁਫੇਰੇ ||੮||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Chaudhayray ?8?
translation: Only gurmukh realises this fact, that the Lord pervades all around.

gurmukhi: ੯ ਅਨੇਕਤਾ ਵਿਚ ੲੇਕਤਾ
translation: Unity in diversity

gurmukhi: ਬਿਰਖੁ ਹੋਵੈ ਬੀੳੁ ਬੀਜੀਅੈ ਕਰਦਾ ਪਾਸਾਰਾ
transliteration: Birakhu Hovai Beeu Beejeeai Karadaa Paasaaraa.
translation: From seed comes up the tree and then it spreads further.

gurmukhi: ਜੜ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਪੇਡ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਬਹੁ ਡਾਲ ਬਿਸਥਾਰਾ
transliteration: Jarh Andari Payd Baaharaa Bahu Daal Bisadaaraa.
translation: Root extends in earth, the stem outside and the branches extend all around.

gurmukhi: ਪਤ ਫੁਲ ਫਲੀਦਾ ਰਸ ਰੰਗ ਸਵਾਰਾ
transliteration: Pat Phul Phal Phaleedaa Ras Rang Savaaraa.
translation: It becomes full of flowers, fruits, and means of many colours and delightful essences.

gurmukhi: ਵਾਸੁ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ੳੁਲਾਸੁ ਕਰਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਵਡ ਪਰਵਾਰਾ
transliteration: Vaasu Nivaasu Ulaasu Kari Hoi Vad Paravaaraa.
translation: In its flowers and fruits dwell fragrance and joy and now this seed becomes a large family.

gurmukhi: ਫਲ ਵਿਚਿ ਬੀੳੁ ਸੰਜੀੳੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਫਲ ਫਲੋਂ ਹਜਾਰਾ
transliteration: Phal Vichi Beeu Sanjeeu Hoi Phal Phalay Hajaaraa.
translation: Again the fruit by producing seeds becomes the source of myriad flowers and fruits.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਨਿਸਤਾਰਾ ||੯||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Nisataaraa ?9?
translation: Understanding of this very fact that the Lord alone is among all makes the gurmukh liberated.

gurmukhi: ੧੦ ਸੂਤ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼੍ਰਟਾਂਤ
translation: Example of thread

gurmukhi: ਹੋਵੇ ਸੂਤ ਕਪਾਹ ਦਾ ਕਰਿ ਤਾਣਾ ਵਾਣਾ
transliteration: Hovay Sootu Kapaah Daa Kari Taanaa Vaanaa.
translation: From cotton the thread and then its warp and waft is prepared.

gurmukhi: ਸੂਤਹੁ ਕਪੜੁ ਜਾਣੀਅੈ ਅਾਖਾਣ ਵਖਾਣਾ
transliteration: Sootahu Kaparhu Jaaneeai Aakhaan Vakhaanaa.
translation: It is well known that from that very thread the cloth is made.

gurmukhi: ਚੳੁਸੀ ਤੈ ਚੳੁਤਾਰ ਹੋੲਿ ਗੰਗਾ ਜਲੁ ਜਾਣਾ
transliteration: Chaousee Tai Chaoutaar Hoi Gangaa Jalu Jaanaa.
translation: Made of the four  threads are what are known as chausi, gangajali etc.(in india).

gurmukhi: ਖਾਸਾ ਮਲਮਲ ਸਿਰੀਸਾਫੁ ਤਨਸੁਖ ਮਨਿ ਭਾਣਾ
transliteration: Khaasaa Malamal Sireesaaphu Tan Soukh Mani Bhaanaa.
translation: The superior clothes (malmal, sirisaph) made out of it impart comfort and pleasure to the body.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਗ ਦੁਪਟਾ ਚੋਲਣਾ ਪਟਕਾ ਪਰਵਾਣਾ
transliteration: Pag Doupataa Cholanaa Patoukaa Paravaanaa.
translation: By becoming turban, scarf, waist coat etc that thread from cotton becomes acceptable to one and all.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਰੰਗ ਮਾਣਾ ||੧੦||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Rang Maanaa ?10?
translation: The Lord permeates among all and the gurmukhs enjoy His love.

gurmukhi: ੧੧ ਸੋਨੇ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Example of gold

gurmukhi: ਸੁਨਿਅਾਰਾ ਸੁੲਿਨਾ ਘੜੈ ਗਹਣੇ ਸਾਵਾਰੇ
transliteration: Souniaaraa Suinaa Gharhai Gahanay Saavaaray.
translation: The goldsmith creates beautiful ornaments out of gold.

gurmukhi: ਪਿਪਲ ਵਤਰੇ ਵਾਲੀਅਾਂ ਤਾਨੳੁੜੇ ਤਾਰੇ
transliteration: Pipal Vataray Vaaleeaa Taanaurhay Taaray.
translation: Among them many are like pipal leaf for adornment of ears and many are made of gold wire.

gurmukhi: ਵੇਸਰ ਨਥਿ ਵਖਾਣੀਅੈ ਕੰਠ ਮਾਲਾ ਧਾਰੇ
transliteration: Vaysari Nadi Vakhaaneeai Kantd Maalaa Dhaaray.
translation: From gold, nose-rings and necklaces are also worked into their shape.

gurmukhi: ਟੀਕਤਿ ਮਣੀਅਾ ਮੋਤਿਸਰ ਗਜਰੇ ਪਾਸਾਰੇ
transliteration: Teekati Maneeaa Motisar Gajaray Paasaaray.
translation: Ornament for the forehead (tikka), jewels studded necklace, pearl garlands are made.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਰਾ ਬੁਹੱਟਾ ਗੋਲ ਛਾਪ ਕਰਿ ਬਹੁ ਪਰਕਾਰੇ
transliteration: Dur Bahoutaa Gol Chhaap Kari Bahu Parakaaray.
translation: Variegated wrist chains and round rings are prepared from gold.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਵੀਚਾਰੇ ||੧੧||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Veechaaray ?11?
translation: The gurmukh feels that like gold He is the basis of each and every thing.

gurmukhi: ੧੨ ਗੰਨੇ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Example of sugarcane

gurmukhi: ਗੰਨਾ ਕੋਲੂ ਪੀੜੀਅੈ ਰਸੁ ਦੇ ਦਰਹਾਲਾ
transliteration: Gannaa Koloo Peerheeai Rasu Day Darahaalaa.
translation: Crushed by the crushing machine sugarcane gives juice instantly.

gurmukhi: ਕੋੲੀ ਕਰੇ ਗੁੜੁ ਭੇਲੀਅਾਂ ਕੋ ਸਕਰ ਵਾਲਾ
transliteration: Koee Karay Gurhu Bhayleeaan Ko Sakar Vaalaa.
translation: Some prepare lumps of jaggery and brown sugar out of it.

gurmukhi: ਕੋੲੀ ਖੰਡ ਸਵਾਰਦਾ ਮਖਣ ਮਸਾਲਾ
transliteration: Koee Khand Savaaradaa Makhan Masaalaa.
translation: Some prepare refined sugar and some adding in it sweet drops make special jaggery.

gurmukhi: ਹੋਵੈ ਮਿਸਰੀ ਕਲੀਕੰਦ ਮਿਠਿਅਾੲੀ ਢਾਲਾ
transliteration: Hovai Misaree Kaleekand Mitdiaaee Ddhaalaa.
translation: It is moulded into lump sugar and variegated sweets.

gurmukhi: ਖਾਵੈ ਰਾਜਾ ਰੰਕੁ ਕਰਿ ਰਸ ਭੋਗ ਸੁਖਾਲਾ
transliteration: Khaavai Raajaa Ranku Kari Ras Bhog Soukhaalaa.
translation: The poor and the wealthy both eat it with pleasure.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਾਲਾ ||੧੨||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Soukhaalaa ?12?
translation: God (similar to sugarcane juice) permeates through all; for gurmukhs He is the essence of all the pleasures.

gurmukhi: ੧੩ ਗਾਂ ਦੇ ਦੁੱਧ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Example of cow-milk

gurmukhi: ਗਾੲੀਂ ਰੰਗ ਬਿਰੰਗ ਬਹੁ ਦੁਧੁ ੳੁਜਲੁ ਵਰਣਾ
transliteration: Gaaee Rang Birang Bahu Dudhu Ujalu Varanaa.
translation: Cows are of different hues but the milk of all is white.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਧਹੁ ਦਹੀ ਜਮਾੲੀਅੈ ਕਰਿ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਧਰਣਾ
transliteration: Dudhahu Dahee Jamaaeeai Kari Nihachalu Dharanaa.
translation: For making curd Some rennet is added into it and then it is placed undistributed.

gurmukhi: ਦਹੀ ਵਿਲੋੲਿ ਅਲੋੲੀਅੈ ਛਾਹਿ ਮਖਣ ਤਰਣਾ
transliteration: Dahee Viloi Aloeeai Chhaahi Makhan Taranaa.
translation: By churning curd one finds butter over the butter milk.

gurmukhi: ਮਖਣੁ ਤਾੲਿ ਅੳੁਟਾੲਿਕੈ ਘਿੳੁ ਨਿਰਮਲ ਕਰਣਾ
transliteration: Makhanu Taai Aoutaai Kai Ghiu Niramal Karanaa.
translation: The butter boiled properly is transformed into ghee – clarified butter.

gurmukhi: ਹੋਮ ਜਗ ਨੲੀਵੇਦ ਕਰਿ ਸਭ ਕਾਰਜ ਸਰਣਾ
transliteration: Hom Jag Naeevayd Kari Sabh Kaaraj Saranaa.
translation: Then that ghee is used as burnt offering and him yajn(rituals) and other oblation are performed.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਜਰਣਾ ||੧੩||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Hoi Jaranaa ?13?
translation: Gurmukh knows that the Lord is all pervading but to reach Him one has to have  spiritual quest as well as the sense of contentment.

gurmukhi: ੧੪ ਸੂਰਜ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Example of sun

gurmukhi: ਪਲ ਘੜੀਅਾ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਪਹਰ ਥਿਤ ਵਾਰ ਗਣਾੲੇ
transliteration: Pal Gharheeaa Moorati Pahari Dit Vaar Ganaaay.
translation: From moments, the gharis (a unit of time equal to 22).

gurmukhi: ਦੁੲਿ ਪਖ ਬਾਰਹ ਮਾਹ ਕਰਿ ਸੰਜੋਗ ਬਣਾੲੇ
transliteration: Dui Pakh Baarah Maah Kari Sanjog Banaaay.
translation: (5 minutes), muhurat (auspicious time), the quarters of day and night (pahar – three hourstime) dates and days have been counted. Then joining two fortnights (dark- light) and twelve months have been made.

gurmukhi: ਛਿਅ ਰੁਤੀ ਵਰਤਾੲੀਅਾ ਬਹੁ ਚਲਿਤ ਬਣਾੲੇ
transliteration: Chhia Routee Varataaeeaan Bahu Chalit Banaaay.
translation: Many inspiring visuals have been created through the six seasons.

gurmukhi: ਸੂਰਜ ੲਿਕੁ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਲੋਕੁ ਵੇਦ ਅਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Sooraju Iku Varatadaa Loku Vayd Alaaay.
translation: But as say the knowledgeable persons the sun remains the same among these all.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨਾ ਬਹੁ ਪੰਥ ਚਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Chhia Darasanaan Bahu Padi Chalaaay.
translation: Similiarly, four varans, six philosophies and many sects have been promulgated,

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਮਝਾੲੇ ||੧੪||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Samajhaaay ?14?
translation: But the gurmukh understands all (and hence there should be no in-fightings).

gurmukhi: ੧੫ ੳੁਹੋ ਭਾਵ ਬੈਸੰਤਰ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Same idea-example of fire

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕੁ ਪਾਣੀ ੲਿਕ ਧਰਤਿ ਹੈ ਬਹੁ ਬਿਰਖ ੳੁਪਾੲੇ
transliteration: Iku Paanee Ik Dharati Hai Bahu Birakh Oupaaay.
translation: The water is one and the earth is also one but the flora is of variegated qualities.

gurmukhi: ਅਫਲ ਸਫਲ ਪਰਕਾਰ ਬਹੁ ਫਲ ਫੁਲ ਸੁਹਾੲੇ
transliteration: Aphal Saphal Parakaar Bahu Phal Phul Suhaaay.
translation: Many are devoid of fruits and many are adorned with flowers and fruits.

gurmukhi: ਬਹੁ ਰਸ ਰੰਗ ਸੁਵਾਸਨਾ ਪਰਕਿਰਤਿ ਸੁਭਾੲੇ
transliteration: Bahu Ras Rang Suvaasanaa Parakirati Soubhaaay.
translation: They have diverse kinds of fragrance  and by their many kinds of extracts they enhance the grandeur of Nature.

gurmukhi: ਬੈਸੰਤਰੁ ੲਿਕੁ ਵਰਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਸਭ ਤਰਵਰ ਛਾੲੇ
transliteration: Baisantaru Iku Varan Hoi Sabh Taravar Chhaaay.
translation: The same fire is there in all trees.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਪਤਹੁਂ ਪਰਗਟ ਹੋੲਿ ਕੈ ਭਸਮੰਤ ਕਰਾੲੇ
transliteration: Goupatahu Paragat Hoi Kai Bhasamant Karaaay.
translation: That unmanifest fire becoming manifest reduces all to ashes.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਪਾੲੇ ||੧੫||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Soukh Paaay ?15?
translation: Likewise, that (unmanifest) Lord resides in all and this very fact makes Gurmukhs full of  delight.

gurmukhi: ੧੬ ਬਿਰਦ ਪਾਲਨ
translation: Living up to one's natural repute

gurmukhi: ਚੰਦਨ ਵਾਸ ਵਣਾਸਪਤਿ ਸਭ ਚੰਦਨ ਹੋਵੈ
transliteration: Chandan Vaas Vanaasapati Sabh Chandan Hovai.
translation: The whole vegetation planted near sandal tree becomes fragrant like sandal.

gurmukhi: ਅਸਟ ਧਾਤੁ ੲਿਕ ਧਾਤੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਸੰਗਿ ਪਾਰਸਿ ਢੋਵੈ
transliteration: Asat Dhaatu Ik Dhaatu Hoi Sangi Paarasi Ddhovai.
translation: Being in touch with the philosophers’s stone and the alloy of light metals transforms into one metal (gold).

gurmukhi: ਨਦੀਅਾ ਨਾਲੇ ਵਾਹੜੈ ਮਿਲਿ ਗੰਗ ਗੰਗੋਵੈ
transliteration: Nadeeaa Naalay Vaaharhay Mili Gang Gangovai.
translation: Rivers, streams and brooks after joining the Ganges are known by the name of Ganges.

gurmukhi: ਪਤਿਤ ੳੁਧਾਰਣੁ ਸਾਧੁ ਸੰਗ ਪਾਪਾਂ ਮਲੁ ਧੋਵੈ
transliteration: Patit Udhaaranu Saadhasangu Paapaan Malu Dhovai.
translation: The redeemer of the fallen ones is the holy congregation wherein the dirt of sins is cleansed.

gurmukhi: ਨਰਕ ਨਿਵਾਰ ਅਸੰਖ ਹੋੲਿ ਲਖ ਪਤਿਤ ਸੰਗੋਵੈ
transliteration: Narak Nivaar Asankh Hoi Lakh Patit Sangovai.
translation: Myriads of apostates and hells have obtained redemption through and in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਅਲੋਵੈ ||੧੬||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Alovai ?16?
translation: The gurmukh beholds and understands that God pervades one and all.

gurmukhi: ੧੭ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ
translation: Love

gurmukhi: ਦੀਪਕ ਹੇਤੁ ਪਤੰਗ ਦਾ ਜਲ ਮੀਨ ਤਰੰਦਾ
transliteration: Deepak Haytu Patang Daa Jal Meen Tarandaa.
translation: Moth loves burning lamp and fish goes on swimming in water for love of It.

gurmukhi: ਮਿਰਗੁ ਨਾਦ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਹੈ ਭਵਰ ਕਵਲਿ ਵਸੰਦਾ
transliteration: Miragu Naad Visamaadu Hai Bhavar Kavali Vasandaa.
translation: For deer the musical sound is the source of delight, and the black bee being in love for lotus gets enveloped in it.

gurmukhi: ਚੰਦ ਚਕੋਰ ਪਰੀਤਿ ਹੈ ਦੇਖਿ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਧਰੰਦਾ
transliteration: Chand Chakor Pareeti Hai Daykhi Dhiaanu Dharandaa.
translation: The redlegged patridge (chakor) loves the moon and concentrates upon it.

gurmukhi: ਚਕਵੀ ਸੂਰਜ ਹੇਤੁ ਹੈ ਸੰਜੋਗੁ ਬਣੰਦਾ
transliteration: Chakavee Sooraj Haytu Hai Sanjogu Banandaa.
translation: Female ruddy sheldrake (chakavi) loves the sun and only on sunrise it meets and mates with its patner.

gurmukhi: ਨਾਰਿ ਭਤਾਰ ਪਿਅਾਰੁ ਹੈ ਮਾਂ ਪੁਤੁ ਮਿਲੰਦਾ
transliteration: Naari Bhataar Piaaru Hai Maan Poutu Miladaa.
translation: Woman loves her husband and it is love that the mother brings forth the son.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਰਚੰਦਾ ||੧੭||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Parachandaa ?17?
translation: Beholding Him operative in all, the gurmukh feels contented.

gurmukhi: ੧੮ ਅੰਗਾਂ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Examples of organs-eyes etc.

gurmukhi: ਅਖੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਦੇਖਦਾ ਸਭ ਚੋਜ ਵਿਡਾਣਾ
transliteration: Akhee Andari Daykhadaa Sabh Choj Vidaanaa.
translation: Through the eyes (of the world) He beholds all the wondrous feats.

gurmukhi: ਕੰਨੀ ਸੁਣਦਾ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਅਾਖਾਣਿ ਵਖਾਣਾ
transliteration: Kannee Sounadaa Surati Kari Aakhaani Vakhaanaa.
translation: With full consciousness He listens to the stories narrated.

gurmukhi: ਜੀਭੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਬੋਲਦਾ ਬਹੁ ਸਾਦ ਲੁਭਾਣਾ
transliteration: Jeebhai Andari Boladaa Bahu Saad Loubhaanaa.
translation: Through tongue, He speaks and relishes all the tastes.

gurmukhi: ਹਥੀ ਕਿਰਤਿ ਕਮਾਵਦਾ ਪਗਿ ਚਲੈ ਸੁਜਾਣਾ
transliteration: Hatheen Kirati Kamaanvadaa Pagi Chalai Sujaanaa.
translation: He works with hands and He, the  Omniscient One, walks on feet.

gurmukhi: ਦੇਹੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ੲਿਕ ਮਨੁ ੲਿੰਦ੍ਰੀ ਪਰਵਾਣਾ
transliteration: Dayhee Andari Iku Manu Indree Paravaanaa.
translation: In body, He is the mind whose orders are obeyed by all the organs.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖੁ ਮਾਣਾ ||੧੮||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Soukhu Maanaa ?18?
translation: Understanding (the fact) that He permeates through all, gurmukhs feel delighted.

gurmukhi: ੧੯ ਸ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟੀ ਤੇ ਸ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟੇ ਦਾ ਪ੍ਰਬੰਧ
translation: The relation between the creation and the creator

gurmukhi: ਪਵਣ ਗੁਰੂ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਹੈ ਰਾਗ ਨਾਦ ਵੀਚਾਰਾ
transliteration: Pavan Guroo Guru Sabadu Hai Raag Naad Veechaaraa.
translation: The basis of the world is air (the mixture of gases) and Sabad (Word) is the Guru of all knowledge from which flow further all thoughts, music and attendant sounds.

gurmukhi: ਮਾਤ ਪਿਤਾ ਜਲੁ ਧਰਤਿ ਹੈ ੳੁਤਪਤ ਸੰਸਾਰਾ
transliteration: Maat Pitaa Jalu Dharati Hai Outapati Sansaaraa.
translation: Mother and father are the creative forces in the form of earth and water.

gurmukhi: ਦਾੲੀ ਦਾੲਿਅਾ ਰਾਤਿ ਦਿਹੁ ਵਰਤੇ ਵਰਤਾਰਾ
transliteration: Daaee Daaiaa Raati Dihu Varatay Varataaraa.
translation: Night and day are the nurses who nurse for the creatures and this way the whole system goes on operating.

gurmukhi: ਸਿਵ ਸਕਤੀ ਦਾ ਖੇਲੁ ਮੇਲੁ ਪਰਕਿਰਤਿ ਪਸਾਰਾ
transliteration: Siv Sakatee Daa Khaylu Maylu Parakirati Pasaaraa.
translation: With the combination of Siva (the consciousness) and Sakti (the inert nature) this whole world comes into being.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਘਟਿ ਚੰਦ੍ਰ ਅਕਾਰਾ
transliteration: Paarabraham Pooran Brahamu Ghati Chandu Akaaraa.
translation: That transcendental perfect Lord is permeating through all as the same moon in the sky is visualised in all the pitchers of water.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਨਿਰਧਾਰਾ ||੧੯||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Niradhaaraa ?19?
translation: That Lord beyond all the sustenances is the sustenance for the gurmukhs and He alone operates through all.

gurmukhi: ੨੦ ਅਾਪ ਹੀ ਅਾਪ
translation: He and He alone is

gurmukhi: ਫੁਲਾਂ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਵਾਸੁ ਹੈ ਹੋੲਿ ਭਵਰੁ ਲੁਭਾਣਾ
transliteration: Phulaan Andari Vaasu Hai Hoi Bhavaru Loubhaanaa.
translation: The Lord is the fragrance in flowers and becoming black bee He is attracted towards flowers.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਬਾਂ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਰਸ ਧਰੇ ਕੋੲਿਲ ਰਸ ਮਾਣਾ
transliteration: Anbaan Andari Ras Dharay Koil Rasu Maanaa.
translation: Sap in the mangoes is He and becoming nightingale He enjoys the same.

gurmukhi: ਮੋਰ ਬਬੀਹਾ ਹੋੲਿਕੈ ਘਣ ਵਰਸ ਸਿਞਞਞਞਾਣਾ
transliteration: Mor Babeehaa Hoi Kai Ghan Varas Sivaanaa.
translation: Becoming peacock and the rain bird (papthd) only He identifies the delight in raining of the clouds.

gurmukhi: ਖੀਰ ਨੀਰ ਸੰਜੋਗ ਹੋੲਿ ਕਲੀਕੰਦ ਵਖਾਣਾ
transliteration: Kheer Neer Sanjog Hoi Kaleekand Vakhaanaa.
translation: He transforms Himself into variegated sweets by becoming milk and water.

gurmukhi: ਓਅੰਕਾਰੁ ਅਕਾਰੁ ਕਰਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਿੰਡ ਪਰਾਣਾ
transliteration: Aoankaaru Aakaaru Kari Hoi Pind Paraanaa.
translation: The same Formless Lord assuming different forms is residing in all the bodies.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਵਰਤਦਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਰਵਾਣਾ ||੨੦||੨||
transliteration: Aapay Aapi Varatadaa Guramoukhi Paravaanaa ?20?2?
translation: He is omnipresent in all substances and activities and gurmukhs bow before all such stages.

gurmukhi: ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਅਲਖ ਅਭੇਵ ਅਗਮ ਅਪਾਰ ਅਨੰਤ ਗੁਰ
transliteration: Abigati Alakh Abhayva , Agam Apaar Anant Gur ?
translation: Eternal, imperceptible, fearless, beyond reach, illimitable, infinite and destroyer of the darkness of ignorance

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਨਾਨਕ ਦੇਵ ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ||੧||੨||
transliteration: Satigur Naanak Dayva , Paarabraham Pooran Braham ?1?2?
translation: Waheguru (Lord) who is transcendental and immanent in the form of Guru Nanak Dev.

gurmukhi: ਅਗਮ ਅਪਾਰ ਅਨੰਤ ਗੁਰ ਅਬਿਗਤ ਅਲਖ ਅਭੇਵ
transliteration: Agam Apaar Anant Gur , Abigat Alakh Abhayv ?
translation: The embodiment of formless God, who is imperishable, beyond description, inaccessible, illimitable, infinite and destroyer of darkness of ignorance.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਨਾਨਕ ਦੇਵ ||੨||੨||
transliteration: Paarabraham Pooran Brahama , Satigur Naanak Dayv ?2?2?
translation: Satgur (True Guru) Nanak Dev is the immanent form of God.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਨਾਨਕ ਦੇਵ ਦੇਵ ਦੇਵੀ ਸਭ ਧਿਅਾਵਹਿ
transliteration: Satigur Naanak Dayva , Dayv Dayvee Sabh Dhiaavahi ?
translation: All gods and goddesses contemplate on the True Guru, Guru Nanak Dev.

gurmukhi: ਨਾਦ ਬਾਦ ਬਿਸਮਾਦ ਰਾਗ ਰਾਗਨਿ ਗੁਨ ਗਾਵਹਿ
transliteration: Naad Baad Bisamaada , Raag Raagani Goun Gaavahi ?
translation: They along with minstrels of heaven sing his praises to the accompaniment of musical instruments producing ecstatic music.

gurmukhi: ਸੁੰਨ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਪਰੰਪਰ
transliteration: Sounn Samaadhi Agaadhi , Saadh Sangati Saparanpar ?
translation: Saints and holy men in his company (Guru Nanak) go in deep meditation and state of nothingness,

gurmukhi: ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਅਲਖ ਅਭੇਵ ਅਗਮ ਅਗਮਿਤਿ ਅਪਰੰਪਰ ||੩||੨||
transliteration: Abigati Alakh Abhayva , Agam Agamiti Aparanpar ?3?2?
translation: And get absorbed in the eternal, imperceptible, infinite, fearless, and inaccessible Lord (Satguru). (2)
